description.narrative: The project objective is to reduce deforestation in the agricultural frontier and to promote sustainable soy production in 6,000,000 ha of the MATOPIBA region.

comment.narrative:
In the ten municipalities the SICAR has 15,410 properties registered as of (1/12/2016): The following provides number of properties registered in each of the 10 municipalities we are going to work in and the area analyzed so far in percentages of the total area of private lands registered. Area below is in hectares: Palmas - Properties: 877 - Total area: 82,594 - Analyzed: 4,885 (6%) Porto Nacional - Properties: 989 - Area: 216,894 - Analyzed: 17,385 (8%) Monte do Carmo - Properties: 515 - Area: 215,121 - Analyzed: 5,995 (3%) Silvanópolis - Properties: 289 - Area: 77,322 - Analyzed: 7,213 (9%) Santa Rosa - Properties: 288 - Area: 109,372 - Analyzed: 3,721 (4%) Formosa do R.Preto - Properties: 3253 - Area: 1,100,614 - Analyzed: 453,131 (41%) Riachão das Neves - Properties: 1742 - Area: 308,589 - Analyzed: 38,478 (12%) Barreiras - Properties: 2416 - Area: 499,786 - Analyzed: 30,565 (7%) Luis Eduardo Magelhães - Properties: 736 - Area: 296,853 - Analyzed: 14,618 (5%) São Desidério - Properties: 4305 - Area: 1,079,962 - Analyzed 81,562 (8%) Total: Properties: 15,410 - Area: 3,987,107 - Analyzed: 657,553 (16,5%) in 2011
Deforestation rate in Matopiba region (2011) is 7,249km2/year
